title.narrative: Caritas South Sudan Capacity Strengthening Initiative

description.narrative: Caritas South Sudan is the official organisation of the Catholic Bishop's Conference in Sudan. It continues to coordinate the work of the various Catholic Dioceses in South Sudan including Sudan. In order to effectively deliver in its support role, CSS has sought financial assistance from CAFOD and CAFOD has agreed to work with CSS in the following areas: 1. Support coordination meeting with the various dioceses in South Sudan to discuss issues concerning the Catholic Church in South Sudan. These forums shall be held in Juba in accordance with the timetable set by the Executive Director of Caritas South Sudan. 2. System change and implementation. CSS will continue in its effort to standardize systems and processes through installation and training of staff on usage of QuickBooks. For Dioceses where CAFOD currently works with directly, CAFOD Finance team will take the lead in the training and system set-up but will rely on CSS to acquire and install the software at the Diocese offices. 3. CAFOD also promote shared learning experiences with other well established Dioceses especially the Catholic Churches in Kenya. Through, a team will be sent for information sharing and training aimed at bringing best practices that can make the Diocese more effective in its service delivery to the people of South Sudan.
